articles.author: Jack Guy, CNN
articles.title: A pair of orcas are targeting great white sharks off South Africa's coast - CNN
articles.description: A pair of orcas drove great white sharks away from a stretch of South African coast after killing five sharks over just a few months in 2017, according to a new study.
